title: Project Management
description: I blend robust methods and empathy to help teams accomplish great things.

title: Data migration & cleanup
description: Migrating to a new system? I use powerful tools to painlessly bring over your metadata.

title: Systems Integration
description: Did you say API? Like humans, systems work best when they work together. I help them speak the same language.

title: Technology Training
description: Empower your team to automate repetitive tasks and free up their valuable time. I offer bespoke training sessions on data manipulation and cleanup tools such as OpenRefine, data management, and introduction to computer programming.
